alert.note: Alert for City of Hampton; City of Newport News; City of Norfolk; City of Poquoson; City of Portsmouth; City of Suffolk; Isle of Wight; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 1:32AM EDT until June 27 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 AM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ISLE OF WIGHT...AND SOUTHEASTERN YORK COUNTIES...THE CITY OF POQUOSON...THE CITY OF NORFOLK...THE CITY OF PORTSMOUTH...THE NORTHEASTERN CITY OF SUFFOLK...THE CITY OF HAMPTON AND THE CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS... At 132 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Tabb to Northampton to Crittenden, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Hampton, Hampton University and Langley AFB around 135 AM EDT. Buckroe Beach, Fort Monroe and Grand View around 140 AM EDT. Old Dominion University, Downtown Portsmouth, Portsmouth, Norfolk NAS and Ghent around 145 AM EDT. Downtown Norfolk, Norfolk State University, Ocean View and Norview around 150 AM EDT. Norfolk around 155 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Fox Hill, Carrollton, Phoebus, Langley View, Longview, Benns Church, Oriana, Huntersville, Wills Corner and Hilton Village. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Hampton; City of Newport News; City of Norfolk; City of Poquoson; City of Portsmouth; City of Suffolk; Isle of Wight; York
